document_data.caption: A map of the Free Cities showing Al-Yatir River near Umara.
document_data.name: Al-Yatir River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Yatir River''' was a small but vital river supporting the city of [[Umara]] in the [[Free Cities of Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Al-Yatir River originated on the northwest slops at the southern end of the [[Furrowed Mountains]].
document_data.Description: The river flowed northwest from the mountains for about a hundred miles before emptying into the [[Great Sea]]. Umara was founded on the river's east bank near the sea.
